explains: adj. [地物] 地热的；[地物] 地温的
wordGroup: geothermal gradient 地温梯度；地热增温率
geothermal well 地热井，格形构架

sentences.en: Eighteen countries now generate electricity using geothermal heat.
sentences.cn: 现在有18个国家使用地热发电。

sentences.en: The contribution of geothermal energy to the world's energy future is difficult to estimate.
sentences.cn: 地热能对世界未来能源的贡献是难以估计的。

sentences.en: One house is heated and cooled with geothermal energy.
sentences.cn: 一所房子是由地热能源供暖和制冷的。
